strapiPost.title: 'See it Be it' With Bentonville Film Festival President
strapiPost.content:
The 8th annual Bentonville Film Festival is fast approaching, and KUAF's Matthew Moore sat down to chat with the festival's president, Wendy Guerrero, about this year's event.

  • New digs: In years past, the film festival has been located right off of the downtown square. This year, however, the festival will be located at The Momentary.
  • Taking volunteers: The festival is all about creating "see it, be it" moments, and they want you to be a part of it. They are still looking for volunteers to help out in many different areas.

Mark your calendars for the festival on June 22, and check out this KUAF story to get a little preview.
